# Seagrass Data {.unnumbered}

## Background

The seagrass transect dashboard can be used to view results for the annual transect monitoring program in Tampa Bay.  Data are available from the mid-1990s to present day.  The dashboard provides summary information, results for individual transects, estimates of the seagrass edge, and data downloads.

## Dashboard

View the dashboard by visiting [https://shiny.tbep.org/seagrasstransect-dash](https://shiny.tbep.org/seagrasstransect-dash){target="_blank"}
